Uses of Class
org.naomi.regex.Matcher

  • Packages that use Matcher 
    Package Description
    org.naomi.regex
    Provides the power of regular expressions without regular expressions.

    • Uses of Matcher in org.naomi.regex

      Methods in org.naomi.regex that return Matcher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matcher Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer sb, String replacement)
      Implements a non-terminal append-and-replace step.
      Matcher Pattern.matcher(CharSequence input)
      Creates a matcher that will match the given input against this pattern.
      Matcher Matcher.region(int start, int end)
      Sets the limits of this matcher's region.
      Matcher Matcher.reset()
      Resets this matcher.
      Matcher Matcher.reset(CharSequence input)
      Resets this matcher with a new input sequence.
      Matcher Matcher.useAnchoringBounds(boolean b)
      Sets the anchoring of region bounds for this matcher.
      Matcher Matcher.useTransparentBounds(boolean b)
      Sets the transparency of region bounds for this matcher.
      Methods in org.naomi.regex with parameters of type Matcher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String Pattern.getMatch(Matcher matcher)
      Equivalent to matcher.group()(this).
      Integer EnumPattern.getOrdinal(Matcher matcher, boolean caseIndependent)
      Returns the zero based ordinal of the first constant of the Enum whose toString() constant of the Enum is case independently equal to matcher.group(this) or null, if none.
      Enum<?> EnumPattern.getValue(Matcher matcher, boolean caseIndependent)
      Returns the first constant of the Enum whose toString() is case independently equal to matcher.group(this)) or null, if none.
